metadata.title: The Sea View Penthouse - Luxury Vacation Rental in Ashdod
metadata.description: Experience luxury at its finest in our stunning sea view penthouse in Ashdod. Perfect for intimate events, family vacations, and unforgettable stays.

hero.title: Your Private Sea View Penthouse
hero.subtitle: Experience luxury living with breathtaking Mediterranean views in the heart of Ashdod. Where modern elegance meets coastal serenity.

altTexts.seaViewSunset: Sea view from penthouse balcony at sunset

homepage.subtitle: Discover an extraordinary penthouse experience where modern elegance meets coastal serenity
